body: For me, this works for a few hours until my token expires, but the Msal library doesn't seem to automatically get a new token. Do you have the same experience? Even after I manually try to sign out with await SignOutManager.SetSignOutState(); any pages that I decorate with an [Authorize] attribute, still get routed to my NotAuthorized view. The only way I can get a new token is if I completely clear localStorage in my browser.
